snippet: Underscoring the hazards of drilling for oil in the Arctic Ocean, Shell said that encroaching sea ice had forced it to halt drilling its first exploration well off Alaska's coast one day after it began.
abstract: Underscoring the hazards of drilling for oil in the Arctic Ocean, Shell said that encroaching sea ice had forced it to halt drilling its first exploration well off Alaska's coast one day after it began.

headline.main: Shell Halts Arctic Drilling Right After It Began
headline.print_headline: Ice Forces Shell To Halt Work On Arctic Well
